articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets mostly fall as investors assess U.S.-China trade developments - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. stock futures slipped in overnight trading after the S&P 500 index rose for a third straight day.
articles.content:
Ajay Rajadhyaksha, global chairman of Research at Barclays, cautions that the biggest risk to U.S. equities is not tariffs or near-term weak growth, but rising long-term bond yields.
